# cpp-11-faq

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/cpp-11-faq
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/cpp-11-faq
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install cpp-11-faq
cpp-11-faq <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g cpp-yiyi-faq
cpp-yiyi-faq <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
